result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Abel H. Hernandez-Ramirez

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Adjustment Number: 22A 021160,
Payable Number: 66234,
Receipt Number: 22R 002324,
Amount: $20.00

11:35 AM  in Room 301.   22CM19 and 20CM176.  Defendant Abel H. Hernandez-Ramirez in court, in person, with Attorney Marc Christopher by telephone.  Kelly Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin in person. Susan Rascon, appears in person, sworn in as interpreter. Attny Christopher advises the Court that he believes he will also be retained on 22CM19, makes special appearance on 22CM19, advises Def. understands charges. Court will set bail on 22CM19. Attny Christopher enters pleas of not guilty on 22CM19. Court receives pleas of not guilty. Signature bond already set; Court orders bond to continue in same form and amount. Counsel may appear by Zoom. Def. advised to keep address current with attny and COC. Def. confirms address in file is correct. Def. does not need to appear at STC.  Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Abel H. Hernandez-Ramirez
Current: 915 Superior Unit 11, Antigo, WI 54409 United States  (Effective: 04-11-2022)
Prior: 300 Prosser Place #48, Antigo, WI 54409
No contact with alleged victim or residence or any location temporary occupies.

03:07 PM Defendant Abel H. Hernandez-Ramirez in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin, via zoom.   Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty.  Def. does not understand English. Court will set bond today.  State gives bail/bond recommendation.  Court orders $1,000 signature bond with conditions. 20CM176 will track with this case - Set for Status Cnf  Initial appearance scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 10:30 am.
